Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

r = game:GetService("RunService")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Tool = script.Parent local Ball = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter
Tool.Enabled = true
local ballAnim local ballClone
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0.0, Ball:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0)
local storedHumanoid = nil
local last_attack = 0
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end
parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - Vector3.new(10, 10, 10), myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(10, 10, 10)), vCharacter, 100) for i = 1, #parts do tempChar = parts[i].Parent tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if tempHumanoid then storedHumanoid = tempHumanoid end end
ballClone = Ball:Clone() ballClone.Parent = game.Workspace ballClone.CanCollide = false
floatOn = float:Clone() floatOn.Parent = ballClone
Ball.Transparency = 1.0
if storedHumanoid ~= nil then torso = storedHumanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") distance = (torso.Position - ballClone.Position).magnitude ballClone.Velocity = (torso.Position - ballClone.Position).unit * distance * 2.0 debris:AddItem(ballClone, 0.65) wait(0.65) Tool.Parent = storedHumanoid.Parent storedHumanoid = nil else
rightLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") leftLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm")
ballAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BallAnim) if ballAnim then ballAnim:Play() end
ballClone.Velocity = (((rightLeg.Position + rightLeg.CFrame.lookVector * 2.0) - ballClone.Position)).unit * 10.0 wait(0.2) ballClone.Velocity = (rightArm.Position - ballClone.Position).unit * 10.0 wait(0.15) ballClone.Velocity = (((rightLeg.Position + rightLeg.CFrame.lookVector * 2.0) - ballClone.Position)).unit * 10.0 wait(0.15) ballClone.Velocity = (rightArm.Position - ballClone.Position).unit * 10.0 wait(0.2) ballClone.Velocity = (((myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * - 2.0) + Vector3.new(0, -2, 0)) - ballClone.Position).unit * 10.0 wait(0.35) ballClone.Velocity = (leftArm.Position - ballClone.Position).unit * 10.0 wait(0.35) ballClone.Velocity = (((leftLeg.Position + leftLeg.CFrame.lookVector * 2.0) - ballClone.Position)).unit * 10.0 wait(0.15) ballClone.Velocity = (leftArm.Position - ballClone.Position).unit * 10.0 wait(0.2) ballClone.Velocity = (rightArm.Position - ballClone.Position).unit * 10.0 wait(0.1) ballClone:Remove() Ball.Transparency = 0.0 end
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if ballAnim then ballAnim:Stop() end if ballClone then ballClone:Remove() end Ball.Transparency = 0.0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
